name: Timelapse Flight | Philadelphia to Dublin | American Airlines B757-200
description:
A timelapse flight from Philadelphia to Dublin onboard American Airlines Boeing 757-200 N934UW operating flight AA722 on April 4/5 2016.

After a short taxi in Philadelphia we get airborne and head towards New York, lighting  up the clouds below.  From New York it's on towards Canada and out across the Atlantic as we are served dinner.  

The sun starts to rise around soon after and we are soon treated to a beautiful dawn sky over the North Atlantic, illuminating the clouds below in a beautiful pink color.

The cabin lights soon come on and breakfast is served, as we commence our descent.  We make a beautiful approach and landing into Dublin, landing ahead of schedule after a flight time from Philadelphia of just 5h41m. 

Video taken from seat 23A.

Airline:  American Airlines
Flight:  AA722
Aircraft:  Boeing 757-200 N938UW
From:  Philadelphia (PHL)
To:  Dublin (DUB)
Departure:  21:18
Arrival:  07:59+1
Flight Time:  05:41
Seat:  23A
Flight Path:  http://goo.gl/LgMWVg


✈ ✈
Equipment used:

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
Swivel Mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y
